Class CodeMatch

Defines a matching condition for a CodeInstruction

Inheritance
System.Object
CodeMatch
Namespace: Harmony
Assembly: cs.temp.dll.dll
Syntax
public class CodeMatch

CodeInstruction instruction

The CodeInstruction to match
System.String name

Type Name Description
System.Collections.Generic.List<OpCode> opcodes

A list of possible System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode

System.String name

(Optional) The name under this match is saved.
